title: RobotServerSettings
description:
Robot server settings.

To override any of these create an environment variable with prefix
OT_ROBOT_SERVER_.

ws_host_name.title: Ws Host Name
ws_host_name.description: TCP/IP hostname to serve on. Will be ignored if domain socket is defined.

ws_port.title: Ws Port
ws_port.description: TCP/IP port to serve on. Will be ignored if domain socket is defined.

ws_domain_socket.title: Ws Domain Socket
ws_domain_socket.description: Unix file system path to serve on. This value supersedes the port and host name settings.

hardware_server_enable.title: Hardware Server Enable
hardware_server_enable.description: Run a jsonrpc server allowing rpc to the  hardware controller. Only works on buildroot because extra dependencies are required.

hardware_server_socket_path.title: Hardware Server Socket Path
hardware_server_socket_path.description: Unix file system path used by the hardware server.

simulator_configuration_file_path.title: Simulator Configuration File Path
simulator_configuration_file_path.description: Path to a json file that describes the hardware simulator.
